description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物。
description.en: A political figure of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国吉林省吉林市下辖县。
description.en: A county under the jurisdiction of Jilin City, Jilin Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国吉林省吉林市的地方国家行政机关。
description.en: The local state administrative organ of Jilin City, Jilin Province, People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党吉林市委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党吉林市委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在吉林市的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Communist Party of China in Jilin City.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国吉林省的地方国家行政机关。
description.en: The local state administrative organ of Jilin Province, People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党吉林省委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党吉林省委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在吉林省的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Communist Party of China in Jilin Province.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任吉林市市长。
description.en: A political figure of the People's Republic of China, former Mayor of Jilin City.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任吉林市市长。
description.en: A political figure of the People's Republic of China, former Mayor of Jilin City.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任中共吉林市委书记。
description.en: A political figure of the People's Republic of China, former Secretary of the Jilin Municipal Committee of the CPC.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任中共吉林市委书记。
description.en: A political figure of the People's Republic of China, former Secretary of the Jilin Municipal Committee of the CPC.

description.zh-cn: 1983年，吴广才担任吉林市人民政府副市长。
description.en: In 1983, Wu Guangcai served as Deputy Mayor of the Jilin Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 1986年，吴广才升任吉林市人民政府代市长、市长。
description.en: In 1986, Wu Guangcai was promoted to acting mayor and then mayor of the Jilin Municipal People's Government.

relationships.target: 中国共产党吉林市委员会

description.zh-cn: 1986年，吴广才升任中共吉林市委副书记。
description.en: In 1986, Wu Guangcai was promoted to Deputy Secretary of the Jilin Municipal Committee of the CPC.

relationships.target: 中国共产党吉林市委员会

description.zh-cn: 1991年，吴广才改任中共吉林市委书记。
description.en: In 1991, Wu Guangcai was reassigned as Secretary of the Jilin Municipal Committee of the CPC.

description.zh-cn: 1994年，吴广才升任吉林省人民政府秘书长。
description.en: In 1994, Wu Guangcai was promoted to Secretary-General of the Jilin Provincial People's Government.

relationships.target: 中国共产党吉林省委员会

description.zh-cn: 2001年，吴广才升任中共吉林省委副书记。
description.en: In 2001, Wu Guangcai was promoted to Deputy Secretary of the Jilin Provincial Committee of the CPC.

description.zh-cn: 吴广才接替王云坤担任吉林市人民政府市长。
description.en: Wu Guangcai succeeded Wang Yunkun as Mayor of Jilin Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 吴广才的吉林市人民政府市长职务由魏敏学接任。
description.en: Wu Guangcai was succeeded by Wei Minxue as Mayor of Jilin Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 吴广才接替方建宇担任中国共产党吉林市委员会书记。
description.en: Wu Guangcai succeeded Fang Jianyu as Secretary of the Jilin Municipal Committee of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 吴广才的中国共产党吉林市委员会书记职务由赵家治接任。
description.en: Wu Guangcai was succeeded by Zhao Jiazhi as Secretary of the Jilin Municipal Committee of the Communist Party of China.
